page.title: 02Villagers' ideas of Wroxall.
page.content: We wrote a questionaire to find out about what people were interested in Wroxall.We found out how long they had lived here so that they knew something about it.Most people like Wroxall because of the wonderful walks,the village,and the countryside. The things most people in Wroxall find interesting are:- Appuldurcombe House;village history; wild life and birds.The things people dislike about Wroxall are the dangerous roads and poor public transport. Some people are afraid the new houses will destroy the atmosphere of the village,and become too big. People play darts,swimming,tennis,and squash.In the evening people go to friends' houses,to the Worsley and the Star Inn,and Wroxall Social Club. People can play sports at Sandown, Ventnor and Wroxall Community Centre.
